price: 166. En wat jullie overkwam op de dag toen de twee legers elkaar troffen, kwam met de toestemming van Allah, zodat Hij de gelovigen moge testen.
arabic: وَمَآ أَصَٰبَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ فَبِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamā aṣābakum yawma al-taqā al-jamʿāni fabi-idh'ni al-lahi waliyaʿlama al-mu'minīna
